in.raam.ant

Class FingerPrintTask

  • java.lang.Object
    • Task
      • in.raam.ant.FingerPrintTask

  • public class FingerPrintTask
extends Task
    Custom ANT task to fingerprint static resources like CSS, JS, Image files etc. with file checksums to enable dynamic caching in web-servers as described in https://developers.google.com/speed/docs/best-practices/caching, the task will take of reverting file changes and resource name changes back to original after child tasks like WAR, static content TAR creation is completed
    Declaration in build.xml 
            <taskdef name="fingerprint" classname="in.raam.ant.FingerPrintTask" classpath="${CLASSPATH}/ant-fingerprint.jar"/>
    Usage in tasks 
            <target name="execute" depends="declare">
                <fingerprint docroot="${PROJECT_ROOT}/docroot" extensions="js,css">
                        <fileset dir="${PROJECT_ROOT}">
                                <include name="...."/>
                                <include name="...."/>
                                <exclude name="...."/>
                        <fileset>
                        <!--Child tasks like WAR and TAR creation--> 
                        .
                        .
                        .                       
                </fingerprint>               
        </target>
    Patterns for extracting static resource references used from https://code.google.com/p/maven-fingerprint-plugin
